Treatment-emergent flag

Source: R/flags.R
trtemfl.Rd

Derives treatment emergent analysis flag.

Usage

trtemfl(.self)

Arguments

.self

data.frame Input data set

Value

.self with added treatment emergent analysis flag.

Mighty

Type

derivation

Depends

  • .self.ASTDT

  • .self.TRTSDT

  • .self.TRTEDT

Outputs

  • TRTEMFL

Examples

pharmaverseadam::adae |> 
  dplyr::select(ASTDT, AENDT, TRTSDT, TRTEDT) |> 
  trtemfl()
#> # A tibble: 1,191 × 5
